content: Hello! You've reached XYZ home services. How can I assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
Congratulations! You have won a $1000 gift card! Click here to claim!!!
It seems like this message might not be related to our services. For your safety, we must mark this contact as spam. We will stop further messages from this number. Thank you.
reason: Customer sent unsolicited messages not related to services, likely spam
